results.title: Metformin prevents ischaemic ventricular fibrillation in metabolically normal pigs.

citations.NLM: Lu L, Ye S, Scalzo RL, Reusch JEB, Greyson CR, Schwartz GG. Metformin prevents ischaemic ventricular fibrillation in metabolically normal pigs. Diabetologia. 2017 Aug;60(8):1550-1558. PMID: 28497164

results.title: Targeting hexokinase II to mitochondria to modulate energy metabolism and reduce ischaemia-reperfusion injury in heart.
results.text_hl: The challenge now is to harness mtHKII in the treatment of @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, elective surgery and transplantation. Remote @<m>DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ preconditioning, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration and @GENE_MIR155 @GENE_406947 @@@miR-155@@@/@GENE_MIR144 @GENE_406936 @@@miR-144@@@ manipulations are potential means of doing just that.

citations.NLM: Nederlof R, Eerbeek O, Hollmann MW, Southworth R, Zuurbier CJ. Targeting hexokinase II to mitochondria to modulate energy metabolism and reduce ischaemia-reperfusion injury in heart. Br J Pharmacol. 2014 Apr;171(8):2067-79. PMID: 24032601
